name: Golden Oyster
description: The Golden Oyster (Pleurotus citrinopileatus), also called Lemon Oyster, is a spectacular edible mushroom with bright lemon-yellow caps. It grows in large clusters and originates from Asia. The mushroom is rich in vitamins (A, B, C, D) and has a mild, nutty taste with cashew-like nuances. It is said to be effective for lung emphysema.
